scenes.background: [Monica] questions your reliability after [Bob] raised concerns.
scenes.description: Bob leans forward, tapping his pen. 'So, what's your plan to avoid this in the future?'

options.text: We can set up a rotating schedule to ensure coverage during leaves. How does that sound?
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and social skills by proposing a solution, but your motivation to take immediate action is lower.

options.text: I can arrange to be available for critical tasks even when on leave.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and motivation by offering to be available, but this might affect your self-regulation and personal time.

options.text: I think we need better planning and communication to prevent such last-minute requests.
options.analysis: You suggest improving planning and communication, showing strong social skills and self-regulation, but empathy and emotional perception could be better.
